LENGTH: {property} must have a length between {constraints.0} and {constraints.1}
USERNAME: Username should only contain alphanumeric characters and dots (no sequential dots)

PASSWORD.LOWERCASE: password should contain at least one lowercase letter.
PASSWORD.UPPERCASE: password should contain at least one uppercase letter.
PASSWORD.DIGIT: password should contain at least one digit.
PASSWORD.SPECIAL: password should contain at least one special character.
PASSWORD.LENGTH: password should be at least 8 characters long.
